title: "Walter" script logo
content:
Please help ID this font.  
thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130915043555im_/http:/typophile.com/files/walter_3888.jpg)
author: vinnybear

comments.content: I fear this is a custom designed logo. You may be able to find a couple of similar scripts, but not this exact one.

This is a logotype rather than a typeface try searching for similar here  
 [http://bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130915043555/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg1.html "http://bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg1.html")

Tim

hey guys,  
i realize this has been styled from a font, and i do not need to recreate the logo, i just need to use the script in some of the store's other signage  
thanks

It might also be created entirely from hand, with no font as a basis.

Here are some similar scripts:  
 [FF Market](http://web.archive.org/web/20130915043555/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_market_ot/)  
 [Freehand 575](http://web.archive.org/web/20130915043555/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/bitstream/freehand_575_ot/)  
 [Schuss Hand Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20130915043555/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/itc_schuss_hand_bold/)  
 [More handwritten scripts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130915043555/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/contemporary-handwriting-fonts/)

FYI - i happen to know that it was created from a font as the basis.  
thanks for the suggestions
Well it's a lovely font, then. Please let us know what it is if you ever find out.
